name: Hacker_Man
description:
Hacker_Man Is an Acronym Based hacking game where a player tries to solve the following acronyms in order to hack into the following Locations specified.This Project can be Termed as my first Ever Official project on the internet .

Old Style. CRT Computer  based Hacking game With Realistic Key sounds.

Try sticking and solving the level 3 . a little hard work was involved in making the ASCII characters . Good Luck. :)
